markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Practiced Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=2257) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139)

</column>

---

After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the [Defend](/Actions.aspx?ID=512) exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.
name: Practiced Defender
